import React, { useState } from "react"; const chartList = [ "Aleutian Islands", "Andaman Islands", "Antarctica Peninsula", "Azores Islands", "Banda Sea", "Bismarck Sea", "Central Alaska", "Central California", "Central Chile", "Central Turkey", "Easter Island Region", "Eastern Honshu", "Eastern Turkey", "Gulf of California", "Hindukush Region", "Iran-Iraq Border Region", "Italy Region", "Japan Region", "Kamchatka Peninsula", "Kuril Islands", "Mid-Atlantic Ridge", "New Zealand", "Northern California", "Northern Chile", "Near East Coast Mexico", "Near Coast Ecuador", "Near Coast Peru", "Philippine Sea", "Puerto Rico", "Solomon Islands", "Southern Alaska", "South Sandwich Islands", "Taiwan Region", "Tonga Region", "Vanuatu Islands", "Western Iran", "Western Turkey", ]; export default function ChartSection() { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(chartList[0]); const getFileName = (name) => name.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g, "_"); return (

Earthquake Chart Viewer

Displaying chart for {selected}
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = "/charts/placeholder.png"; }} />
); }
